title: I need help with this
body: I have a mission that is complete 7 missions, i have completed 6 so far but I have none left, i have waited a day so far and nothing, can u help me?

replies.body: Sometimes you need to refresh the client to get your daily missions to update. Give that a try and let me know if you still don't have any for today.

Keep waiting buddy, its going to come 
I think its like a complete 24 hours till you get them again
